ai-patthana16.39:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.39:0.3_0: There are immediately effective, inviting inspection, relevant, so that sensible people can know it for themselves.
ai-patthana16.39:1.1_0: There is a cause of wrong conduct, not because of wrong livelihood.
ai-patthana16.39:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of wrong understanding.
